Security & Encryption

Pipo was built to solve a problemâ€¦security. Here we explain how we go about doing that.

Public Key & Membership

  1. Server is created with an admin certificate composed of two admin's public keys and a signed payload.
  2. All membership changes start with one of these two admins and can be verified.
  3. An admin that has been added by an original admin can add a new user which can then be verified by verifying signatures starting with the newly added user, working your way up the chain to one of the original two admins

Run Your Own

pipo allows you to run your own server for ultimate privacy and security
